test-case.name: fn-zero-or-one-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:zero-or-one function with argument sequence containing more than one item

test-case.name: K-SeqZeroOrOneFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `zero-or-one(1, 2)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqZeroOrOneFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `zero-or-one()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqZeroOrOneFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `zero-or-one(true())`.

test-case.name: K-SeqZeroOrOneFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(zero-or-one(()))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqZeroOrOneFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(zero-or-one( "one" )) eq 1`.

test-case.name: K-SeqZeroOrOneFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(zero-or-one( () )) eq 0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqZeroOrOneFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `zero-or-one(error())`.

test-case.name: K-SeqZeroOrOneFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `zero-or-one( (1, 2, 3) )`.

test-case.name: cbcl-if-not-empty-001
test-case.description: Test an optimization in if-not-empoty for empty return
test-case.test: for $x in zero-or-one((1 to 10)[. div 2 = 0]) return ()

test-case.name: cbcl-zero-or-one-001
test-case.description: test fn:zero-or-one on a count-preserving function
test-case.test: declare function local:generate($arg as xs:integer?) { if ($arg = 0) then (1, 2, 3) else $arg }; fn:empty( fn:zero-or-one(fn:unordered( local:generate( () ) )) )

test-case.name: cbcl-zero-or-one-002
test-case.description: test fn:zero-or-one on a sequence of one-or-more items
test-case.test: declare function local:generate($arg as xs:integer?) { if ($arg = 0) then () else if ($arg = 1) then $arg else ($arg, $arg) }; 1 + fn:zero-or-one(fn:one-or-more( local:generate( 1 ) ))
